TopicTitle: How to change main remote control block?

Articles.Content:
Hello!I have a problem.
In my project there are two rc blocks
https://i.imgur.com/2qgVD1i.jpg
The top rc block is upside down.
I need to set bottom block as main. How to do it?

Edited May 25, 2023 by SerdarAd
In flight, right-click the bottom one, then press "control from here" in the window that pops up. That should do the trick.

You could set the lower probe core as the control point (right click it > control from here), or you could flip the control point on the upper one (right click it > control point: normal will become control point: reversed if you click it) and then flip it back when it's separated.

Out of curiosity, why did you put the payload on upside-down?
